ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt at 20
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you all for your input. I have currently ventured back to South Karana to hunt some aviaks, lag is much better and exp is good. This will only last me
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you all for your input. I have currently
ventured back to South Karana to hunt some aviaks, lag is
much better and exp is good. This will only last me
till about 22 or so. I have a question about LOIO, I
earned 17-20 in kurns tower and wonder the best way to
get to LOIO? When we hunted in Kurns, we died twice
running through Forona Vie (sp?) to get there, is running
from spires easier? any suggestions?<br>BTW im on the
Povar server<br><br>Thanks<br>Findella En'Vocati 20th
yr wiz
